title: Comment
description: A comment on an item - for example, a comment on a blog post. The comment's content is expressed via the text property, and its topic via about, properties shared with all CreativeWorks.

allOf.description: The most generic kind of creative work, including books, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.

downvoteCount.description: The number of downvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.

parentItem.description: The parent of a question, answer or item in general.

upvoteCount.description: The number of upvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.
